column4: i found my user account, is there any way to get or reset the password? or even check who changed it?
passwd Username changes a user password (as long as you have the privileges to reset it"
awesome ok.... and is there an idea to find out what it is? or atleast see who changed it?
I actually don't know, but under /var/log you find alot of log messages of your system. the files system and messages might be interesting, or google if passwd hits /var/log/messages
